Enable cookies to use the shopping cart From this week's menu - 1 + Orecchiette with Pistachio Pesto, Pistachio Crumb & Parmigiano Reggiano Regular Â£7.50 From Next week's menu Add a dish From third week's menu Add a dish Scroll for more items Subtotal Â£0.00 You're saving Â£0.00 Shipping & taxes calculated at checkout I agree with the terms and conditions . View Cart Check out Restaurants Chiswick Farringdon Greenwich Guildford Harrods Hotel Indigo York Manchester Airport Richmond Takeaway Recipe kits Catering Experiences Pasta Academy Pasta Academy Gift Vouchers Private Events Christmas 2025 Catering Events FAQs Gifts Pasta Academy Vouchers Gift Vouchers Gift Boxes Gift Subscriptions Pasta Making Kits Atavi Truffle Emporium Order now 0 The Pasta Evangelists story When we started Pasta Evangelists, we wanted to show that there is so much more to pasta than meets the eye. About Pasta Evangelists Pasta makes everything feel better. So why not make pasta taste better? Inspired by this simple mission, our founder Alessandro set out to bring the freshness and quality of the freshly made, pastificio-style pasta he grew up making by hand with his nonna in Italy to British kitchens. Meet our founders Alessandro Savelli Founder & CEO The man with the idea. Favourite fresh pasta? Trofie, from his native Liguria. Chris Rennoldson Co-founder, VP Strategy & Analytics The numbers guy. Favourite fresh pasta? Spaghetti alla chitarra, from Abruzzo. Finn Lagun co-founder & CMO The creative one. Favourite fresh pasta? Orecchiette, from Puglia. Meet our chefs Giancarlo Perbellini Executive Chef The 3 Michelin-starred chef behind our dishes. Favourite pasta dish? Spaghetti with fresh bottarga and lemon. Roberta Dâ€™elia HEAD PASTAIA (PASTA ARTISAN) The woman behind our fresh pasta renaissance. Favourite pasta dish? Orecchiette alle cime di rapa, from her native Puglia. Explore our favourite recipes Reminding us of holidays spent along the Amalfi Coast, our lobster tortelloni (tortelloni allâ€™aragosta) are individually finished by hand Pasta â€˜alla carbonaraâ€™ is not merely a crowd pleaser: it is an integral part of the Roman experience and chapter in the Eternal Cityâ€™s story Our ragÃ¹ al cinghiale â€“ wild boar ragÃ¹ â€“ is simmered for several hours, as in the Tuscan tradition, with exotic aromats like juniper Pistachios are known as the â€˜green goldâ€™ in Sicily, in recognition of their beauty but also expensiveness. We use them to make a vibrant pesto Wild mushrooms are important in the gastronomy of Northern Italy. In great reverence, our chefs feature several varieties in this special sauce Our pasta Pasta has been freshly made on the Italian peninsula for hundreds, if not thousands, of years. Chef dâ€™Elia honours this tradition by preparing our fresh pasta artisanally, using the finest Italian flour and finishing some of our favourite shapes, tortelloni for instance, by hand. No one piece is quite like another. â€œAltro il vino non Ã¨ se non la luce del sole mescolata con lâ€™umido della vite.â€ â€œWine is nothing but sunlight mixed with the humidity of the vine.â€ Although Galileo was talking about viniculture, his quip reminds us of the centrality of nature, and the quality of its produce, in the most beautiful moments of life. Selecting the best ingredients and treating them with respect is the guiding principle of Pasta Evangelists Executive Chef, Giancarlo Perbellini. Our ingredients Chef Perbellini and his team use ingredients of the highest calibre to prepare our dishes. Where possible, we source from local producers here in the UK. That said, there are some questions in gastronomy to which Italy alone has an answer, meaning some products are judiciously sourced from il bel paese to bring you the very best. Discover more The Pasta Academy Our pasta-making classes are led by expert Italian chefs & include unlimited Prosecco. Learn more Work with us Join one of the UKâ€™s fastest-growing food enterprises. Become an Evangelist today. Learn more Safe to Trade We are Safe to Trade certified, which means our food meets the highest safety and quality standards. Learn more Pasta Evangelists Gifts Events Visit Us In Harrods Student Discounts Our Company About Us Careers Blog Franchising Help FAQs Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Press Manage Cookies Get In Touch Call Us Now On 020 3514 8374 10:00 AM - 1:00 AM Email Us On chef@pastaevangelists.com Support Loading... Our app Â© 2025 Pasta Evangelists Ltd. All rights reserved. 1

Ciao Bella - Casa Pasta - Cucina Skip to content Home About Us Menu Toggle Our History Experience Our Menu Gallery Events Gift Cards Ciao Bella Contact Us Reservations Reservations Main Menu Home About Us Menu Toggle Our History Experience Our Menu Gallery Events Gift Cards Ciao Bella Contact Us Discover Ciao Bella, your ultimate destination for nightlife in Fort Pierce. Located in the heart of the city, we invite you to experience the perfect blend of music, dancing, and vibrant atmosphere every Friday and Saturday night from 10 PM to 2 AM. About Us Ciao Bella by Casa Pasta is where the energy of a live DJ meets the excitement of a dance floor. Created for those who love to dance and socialize, our venue offers an unforgettable nightlife experience. What We Offer Live DJ Performances Enjoy electrifying sets from our talented DJs who specialize in mixing the latest hits and classic favorites to keep you dancing all night long. Full Bar Dive into a diverse selection of cocktails, beers, wines, and spirits crafted by our expert bartenders. Whether you prefer a classic cocktail or a trendy concoction, we have something to quench your thirst. Delicious Finger Foods Satisfy your hunger with our tempting finger foods and snacks, perfect for refueling between dance sessions or enjoying with friends. Join Us Whether youâ€™re celebrating a special occasion or simply looking to unwind after a long week, Ciao Bella offers the perfect setting for an evening of music, dancing, and fun with friends. Location Find us at 100 S 2 nd St, Fort Pierce, conveniently situated with easy access and nearby parking options for your convenience. Contact Us For reservations, inquiries about private events, or more information about whatâ€™s happening at Ciao Bella, feel free to reach out to us at (772) 882-4984 or email us at ciaobella@fortcasapasta.com . Our team is here to assist you with any questions you may have. Follow Us Stay connected and up-to-date on upcoming events, special promotions, and DJ line-ups by following us. Donâ€™t miss out on the latest updates and happenings at Ciao Bella! Facebook Instagram Plan Your Visit Whether youâ€™re a local resident or visiting Fort Pierce, Ciao Bella promises an exhilarating nightlife experience that you wonâ€™t forget. Join us for a night of music, dancing, and unforgettable memories. We look forward to welcoming you to Ciao Bella soon! Casagrand Board of Directors and Key Management Team Residential Commercial Industrial Warehouse NRI Ancillary Others About About Casagrand â€“ Building Homes, Shaping Dreams Management Team Media Awards Newsletters Media Coverage Videos Blog Channel Partner Joint Developments Testimonials Standard Resale Rentals Referrals Customer Portal Login Customer Queries Careers Contact Us Investors About About Casagrand Board of members Media Awards Newsletters Media Coverage Videos Blog Channel Partner Joint Developments Testimonials Standard Resale Rentals Referrals Customer Portal Login Customer Queries Careers Tools Stamp Duty Calculator Land Area Calculator Home Loan Prepayment Calculator Contact Us â˜° Residential Commercial Industrial Warehouse NRI Ancillary Others About About Casagrand â€“ Building Homes, Shaping Dreams Management Team Media Awards Newsletters Media Coverage Videos Blog Channel Partner Joint Developments Testimonials Standard Resale Rentals Referrals Customer Portal Login Customer Queries Careers Contact Us Investors Ongoing Projects Ready to Occupy Completed Projects Bengaluru Chennai Coimbatore Bengaluru Chennai Coimbatore Pre-Launch Projects Future Projects BENGALURU CHENNAI COIMBATORE KODAIKANAL BENGALURU CHENNAI COIMBATORE BOARD OF DIRECTORS Arun Mn Founder, Chairman and Managing Director Ã— Arun Mn Founder, Chairman and Managing Director He holds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Engineering from Hindustan University and a Post Graduate Diploma in Management from the Symbiosis Centre for Management and Human Resource Development. He has over 19 years of experience in the real estate industry and was previously associated with Wipro Limited as a Senior Marketing Executive. Sumanth Krishna Raghunathan Director Ã— Sumanth Krishna Raghunathan Director He has been associated with Casagrand since June 1,2015. He holds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Engineering from Anna University and a Post Graduate Diploma in Management from the Management Development Institute, Gurgaon. He was previously associated with CRISIL Limited as Head â€“ DEP IRV COM, Kumaran Systems Private Limited as Senior Executive â€“ Marketing and HCL Technologies Limited as a Senior Project Manager. Mr Sathish CG Deputy Managing Director, Casagrand Premier Builder Limited Ã— Mr Sathish CG Deputy Managing Director, Casagrand Premier Builder Limited Mr Sathish CG is a significant pillar of Casagrandâ€™s phenomenal growth story and a dynamic leader whose vision, execution excellence, and strategic foresight have helped transform the company into one of Indiaâ€™s most formidable real estate brands. With 20+ years of expertise in real estate , Mr. Sathish brings a rare blend of deep industry knowledge and proven business-building expertise. Joining Casagrand in 2012, Sathish quickly emerged as a driving force behind the companyâ€™s sales engine. As Controlling Director of Sales, he crafted and executed strategies that generated 40x revenue in order to achieve an extraordinary â‚¹7601 Cr in just 13 years. Under his leadership, sales teams have been transformed into agile, result-oriented units backed by robust systems and processes, ensuring efficiency and long-term scalability. In 2018, Sathish took on the additional responsibility of leading the Bengaluru Zone, a market that he transformed beyond expectations. Through precise positioning, strategic partnerships, and operational discipline, he drove a 60x growth in just six years, turning Bengaluru into one of Casagrandâ€™s most successful zones. Expanding his portfolio further, Sathish launched and has been leading Casagrandâ€™s resale and rental business (SARA) since 2022. In his current role as Deputy Managing Director, Sathish is working alongside Founder & Managing Director Mr .Arun Mn, sharing responsibility for strategic initiatives, operational control, and tactical decision-making across both residential and non-residential ventures. Raju Venkatraman Independent Director Ã— Raju Venkatraman Independent Director He has been associated with our Company since July,2024. He has completed his Bachelorâ€™s degree in Technology from the Indian Institute of Technology, Madras. He was previously associated with Medall Healthcare Private Limited as the promoter and Managing Director and Firstsource Solutions Limited as the Joint Managing Director and Chief Operating Officer.He was also previously a member of the Board of Directors of American International School â€“ Chennai and has also received the Udyog Rattan Award from the Institute of Economic Studies. K V Ganesh Independent Director Ã— K V Ganesh Independent Director He has been associated with Casagrand since August,2024. He holds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Commerce (Honours) from the University of Delhi and has also completed the Senior Management Program from the Indian Institute of Management,Calcutta.He is an associate of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India and an Associate of the Institute of Company Secretaries of India.He was previously associated with Logix Microsystems Limited as chief financial officer,Subex Limited as Chief Financial Officer, Global Head â€“ Legal and Company Secretary and TVS Srichakra Limited as the Chief Financial Officer.He was recognised in the 9th edition of the CFO Vision & Innovation Summit & Awards 2023 in appreciation for knowledge sharing.He was presented with a recognition of excellence at the 8th Annual CFO 100 for exceptional calibre and contribution to the world of finance and has also been named as one of the â€œMost Influential CFOs of Indiaâ€ by the Chartered Institute of Management Accountants. Rohini Manian Independent Director Ã— Rohini Manian Independent Director She has been associated with Casagrand since August,2024. She holds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Science (Liberal Studies) from Northeastern University, Boston,Massachusetts,USA.She has been a director of Global Adjustments Services Private Limited since 2016 and Go Fashion (India) Limited since 2021. Key Management Mr. Siva Sankar Reddy Deputy Managing Director, Group Ventures, Casagrand An instrumental leader behind Casagrandâ€™s growth story, Mr. Siva Sankar Reddy has been an integral part of Casagrand leadership since 2012. As one of the most versatile and trusted leaders within the organization, he has played a defining role in Casagrandâ€™s evolution, taking on critical responsibilities across departments and verticals with unmatched dedication and precision. Mr. Reddy began his journey in Casagrand as the Head of Finance and steadily grew into a leadership powerhouse, taking on multifaceted roles such as Controlling Director of CRM , Controlling Director of Engineering , Zonal Director of Chennai (the companyâ€™s primary operational zone), and Director of Casa Grande PropCare . In his current role as Deputy Managing Director, Group Ventures , Mr. Reddy works closely with the CEOs and Managing Directors of each vertical in Casagrand and co-leads all Casagrandâ€™s non-residential businesses to steer performance, drive growth, and explore new opportunities. His portfolio covers Casagrandâ€™s ventures in Commercial, Spaceintell, School, Hospitality, Propcare, PGT Ventures, Contracts, and other emerging businesses. Notably, under his supervision, Casa Grande Propcare has grown multifold, evolving into a robust foundation for becoming one of Indiaâ€™s most respected facilities management players. Over the last 13 years, Mr. Reddy has helped shape Casagrandâ€™s culture of performance, trust, and continuous innovation and continues to be a driving force in propelling the organization into its next phase of growth. Over the last 13 years, Mr. Reddy has helped shape Casagrandâ€™s culture of performance, trust, and continuous innovation and continues to be a driving force in propelling the organization into its next phase of growth.
